mapper.update: update activity set activityRange = #{activityrange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, activityName = #{activityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, activityIntroduction = #{activityintroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, activityStartTime = #{activitystarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, activityEndTime = #{activityendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, activityReleaseTime = #{activityreleasetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, activityDeadLine = #{activitydeadline,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, activityPalce = #{activitypalce,jdbcType=INTEGER}, associationsId = #{associationsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, departmentId = #{departmentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activitiesApplicationTime = #{activitiesapplicationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, activitiesApplicationState = #{activitiesapplicationstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where activityId = #{activityid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
